Posts.Content: Dx, with Stage 1, grade 3 invasive ductal CA right breast. Had double mastecomy, final path report shows no lymph envolvement, and clean margins around the cancer site. Awaiting Oncotype results to see if need chemo. Onocologist states will need med next five years, after reading about all the side effects wondering if its a good idea, have arhritis in by low back, scleraderma, my joints always ache anyway, can't aford any more time off work, this is where my insurance is from. I'm 4 weeks post op, still confused, worried, and uncomfortable,having reconstruction done also. I'm 54 years young. Any input in should I or shouldn't I take a anti cancer drug. A nurse I am and I can't answer this ?Â  Help, hanging in there.
Posts.Title: ? need for to start any meds amridex or toxafin
